= Introduction =

The idea behind the project is to supply a set of classes for tracking the java threads graphically. Three main stages are tracked: 
 # The life time of the thread (when he sleep, activated, running, and dead).
 # Tracking the objects that the thread interact with and their values
 # Tracking thread output
